alert.avalanche-migration: Your DPS tokens have already been transferred on Avalanche! Click <2>here</2>
alert.avalanche-migration-add-token: to add the token to MetaMask.
alert.avalanche-migration-connect: to connect to MetaMask. If MetaMask does not show up, please read our <2>FAQ</2>.
alert.bonus-dps: <0>Earn bonus DPS by helping DeepSquare</0>As a thank you for accepting the new vesting terms, we would like to give you the opportunity of earning bonus DPS! <3>Click here</3> to read more about the bonus.
alert.low-avax: The wallet handling KYC verification is getting low in AVAX (currently {{amount}}). Please refill it, or the KYC process could be blocked.
alert.mobile: It seems that you are using a mobile device. Please use the <2>MetaMask application</2> to connect your wallet.
alert.new-terms: <0>Acceptance of new terms</0>Help the DeepSquare project by accepting the new vesting terms. Click <2>here</2> to read more about the new terms.
alert.wallet-mismatch: <0>Wallet mismatch</0>You are connected to a wallet address that is not registered in our database.<2></2>Please connect to the wallet address you registered with to continue. ({{address}})

bonus-dps-dialog.content: <0>As a thank you for accepting the new vesting terms, we would like to give you the opportunity of earning bonus DPS! This is an additional way you can help put the project in an even stronger position as we approach listing.</0><1></1><2>The full details are available <2>here</2> but in an attempt to summarise, you can lend DeepSquare 25% of your tokens, which will be returned to you over the course of your new vesting period (21 months for PS1 and 18 months for PS2) AND you receive bonus DPS from PS3 to the value your loan of 25% represents.</2>
bonus-dps-dialog.title: Earn bonus DPS by helping DeepSquare

error.adulthood: You must be at least 18 years old to register

error.invalid: You must enter a valid email address to continue.

username.label: Username
username.tooltip: This username is how youâ€™ll be known by the community

card.loading: The verification can take up to 5 minutes.
card.name: Identity verification

mfa.how-to-enable: <0>Enable the two-factor authentication with your account:</0><1><0>Scan this QR code with your authenticator app, such as Authy or Google Authenticator.</0><1>Confirm the enrollment using the 6-digits secret that is generated by your app.</1></1>
mfa.recovery-code-details: These recovery codes allow you to bypass the two-authentication process in case of you do not have access to your OTP app. You should keep those codes in a safe place (like your password manager) and <2>treat them as passwords</2>.
mfa.recovery-code-only-once: You can use each only once.

nav.admin-disabled: You need to connect your MetaMask wallet in order to access the admin panel.

network-banner: <0>DeepSquare now runs on Avalanche Network!</0><1>Please switch to the <2>Avalanche Network</2>.</1>

new-terms-dialog.content: <0>Dear Investor and valued Community Member,</0><1></1><2>We are proud to share that together we have raised ~$3.2M so far! We aim to raise another ~$2.8M from institutional investors in Private Sale 3 at a valuation of $42M ($0.6/DPS).</2><3></3><4>To help attract additional investors and to give the project long-term success, we kindly request that you agree to the proposed changes in the vesting schedule - <2>see here for details</2> (please note that we need your consent to change your vesting terms).</4><5></5>In summary, we request that you agree to accept the new vesting terms. Instead of 25% on listing and 75% after 12 months :<7><0>For Private Sale 1: 9 months after listing, tokens vest at a rate of 1/12th over 12 months</0><1>For Private Sale 2: 6 months after listing, tokens vest at a rate of 1/12th over 12 months</1></7>These changes will help to attract new institutional money and will ultimately support a smoother entry into the market.<9></9><10></10><11><0></0>I understand I will receive the new digital contract by email after having accepted the new terms and that I will need to digitally sign them in order to finalise the process.</11>
new-terms-dialog.title: Help the DeepSquare Project

terms.i-accept-the-terms: I accept the <2>DeepSquare Private Sale Terms and Conditions</2>
terms.you-must-accept: You must accept the conditions to continue.

alert.connect-your-metamask-wallet: Connect your MetaMask wallet to see your current balance.
alert.please-install-metamask: Please <2>install MetaMask.</2> You will need to refresh this page after the installation.

website-under-maintenance: The website is currently under maintenance.
